reviews: ####   Friends plz donot buy this laptop. This has hinges issues which will result into screen damage and other parts. Apart from this HP has highly disappointed post sales services. No value for money....You need to spend more money for getting it repair. I purchased this Laptop in Feb 2021 and Hinges came out in three months without any usages... ####   Happy with the purchase. Awesome product. ####   I am using this laptop since one week. Over-all I am satisfied. Heating problem is there couple of time while high data consumption. But performance of this laptop is too good. ####   display is awesome. size ##  weight ##  flexibility ##  battery  also good. ####   Never purchase a product with HP. Poor quality. I’ve bought my HP ENVY X360 by march. My laptop door got stuck while opening without even a hard handle. I have handled it very carefully each time i used my laptop. Now when i reach support they say that i damaged my laptop and it’s not claimable on warranty. They will rob your money like anything. Customer support is worst. I had a chat with HP support person named Abhishek ##  he kept on coping and pasting messages mentioning the same thing but at last they didn’t answer my question. ####   battery backup is not as clamed to be  ## it last upto 6-7 hrs ####   The laptop is actually good. But I have several issues with ssd and wifi keep on disconnecting. It happened after 20 days of purchase so return window has been closed. In 3 months I have formated my laptop 7 times. ##  ssd motherboard ##  and wifi card has already been changed ##  but still I am getting this problem. ####   An awesome buy!! everything works great!! stylus works very good and ia very responsive. good package by the seller!! loved the product!! ####   Very cute premium product.Works as advertised.Processor better than i5.Only small issue is screen is of  reflective type.Overall I am happy with the lappy.. ####   Right hinge broke after two months of gentle use. The broken hinge hit the screen and cracked it. After long calls and terrible service from HP ##  I was finally told I would have to pay 20k to get the laptop fixed and even though the laptop is under warranty ##  physical damage would not be covered by HP. If it wasn't for the hinge issue and the truly awful customer service by HP ##  I would have given this laptop 5 stars. But sorry to say ##  after this I will never be buying an HP laptop ####   The laptop is overall a great value just make sure you are purchasing the correct size as it seems little smaller if this laptop had a 14 inch display it would have been a perfect laptop ####   The hinge broke and screen is popping out within 3 months of use despite delicate handling. HP doesn't help with warranty claim as they consider it as accidental damage ##  which is not the case. It's the cheap build quality of the plastic used to stabilise the hinge. ####   ## The good. ####   The worst purchase I ever made. Was dead on arrival. ####   Specs are great but the quality seems to be bad. Having speaker issues within 10 days of buying a new laptop. HP service center agreed to change the speakers but even they are not sure if the issue is only due to the speakers. Customer Service is very poor and takes multiple calls to the customer care. This is my 2nd x360 only because the specs looked great and have an HP printer as well. Overall I would not recommend going for HP laptops/products. ####   It's delicate for use ##  battery life not up to the mark and definitely not for heavy task ####   For a simple Battery replacement they took 1 month and still not replaced. Please be careful prior making a buying decision. The HP service is not that effective and friendly. They will simply linger long without any quick resolution. Better try out for other brands like Lenovo/Dell who have 2 days prompt service policy. ####   Very good Laptop for creator ####   I think there is issue with speakers at some point it plays loud and automatically decreases to low I didn't understand where the problem is with speakers or software apart from this issue everything is good ####   Wireless adapter keep missing. Tried to update driver but no use. Only solution is to restart ####   Hinges came out within 3 months before my card emi ends.  Hinges broken on very smooth folding of 360 degrees.  It has very small support between the 2 parts ie ## m monitor and keyboard. ####   Overall ##  laptop is best in term of performance ##  specification ##  and user-friendly. The only problem ##  in table mode if laptop goes to sleep there is no way to wake up the laptop without flipping back to laptop. Although ##  there is an option with the help of digital pen to stick in the lower hing but didn't works everytime. Other than this ##  it's perfect. ####   Best ####   I have used it for a month now. The laptop is a gem. Its fast. Value for money. Touch is good. Great for people requiring two in one laptops. Overall experience is awesome. The only thing that is very average about this laptop is the HP pen and its built quality. Very mediocre built quality considering the price you pay for it. ####   Buy from store ##  costs 74k only ##  suggest you to buy from a store which is nearby. Great laptop thanks you ####    Oneof the best laptop u can buy with a good processor and graphic card... It's new era for RYZEN... byyy byy intel..must have for student ####   I  liked this product very much. It features are very attractive and useful.  the multi- functional. uses  like tablet and laptop is very nice.  The light weight and easily handle with touch screen is beautiful. ####   I've been using this laptop for the past 3 months. Actually ##  I was looking for a 13-inch windows laptop So I bought this ##  and to be honest this is a crazy laptop with good built quality and performance is bonkers. I've binge-watched series in this with external speakers and even used it for my online classes ##  photo editing ##  the battery is very sufficient ##  lasts around 13-14 hours solid. But in mine hinges ##  one side is slightly uneven than the other but they work absolutely fine. No issues so far. Best laptop. If you're looking for a cute ##  powerful ##  handy ##  and efficient laptop ##  go for the HP Envy x360 13 ay0045au. ####   Excellent laptop ####   A dream laptop for most of the people. Has all the specifications and an unmatched performance. ####   The laptop came without OS installed in it. It has major heating issue. You cannot operate for more than 15 mins on your lap. ####   It is a premium machine. Wish battery life was better ####   Ordered as a replacement for my 7 years old HP Pavilion model. This one rocks. Super viewing and listening experience. Form factor is the icing on the cake. Slim bezels. But ##  not suitable for phablet mode usage. Ideal pick for media consumption and ight excel works. Touch screen is not super responsive like it is in the mobile but decent job there too ####   Has a premium feel to it ##  it is compact and lightweight which helps. 3rd Gen Ryzen 5 processors are pretty good ##  rarely an application gets stuck. Serves well for general purpose laptop. Keypads are good ##  soft and easy to adapt. Found the speaker quality decent ##  has Bang & Olufsen speakers ##  quite decent for regular videos ##  don't expect anything fancy in this aspect. ####   Battery life is average we cannot say above average ##  you can play Fortnite ## pubg ##  cod mobile on ultra settings speakers are good ##  the keyboard is good ##  the trackpad is also good ##  the display is good ##  it is the laptop for not very high usage good for light users. When you play games laptop temp goes to 95 degrees celsius. This was shown by and Radeon software already built-in. Again not for heavy usage good for light usage like school work heavy usage like gaming. I bought it from the hp store ##  If you want to do gaming by omen at the same price if you won't use the touchscreen very much. A gaming laptop is better than it has vega 8 integrated graphics  4GB ##  8GB ram non-upgradable. It doesn't support type c charging also which is bad. Thanks! ####   Laptop is making very loud buzzing sound.. it is horrible ####   awesome laptop ##  power full ##  super display ##  nice touch response ##  good build and perfect for entertainment ##  with office work. ####   excellent laptop for students the stylus is nice ##  though the screen is a bit slippery for it. I had purchased it for a basic need but if you need to do graphic intensive work you can prefer HP omen or pavalion series. ####   Laptop is excellent and compact.Touch screen is good and Ryzen processor is much faster than Intel in my view.The network is not picking up sometimes rarely  & system needs a restart.Need to be fixed by HP .otherwise a good Laptop to buy ####   Guys be aware after receiving this  laptop when i checked warrenty online i was shocked because warrenty already started 6 month ago with someone else name so Be careful. ####   Amazing buy. Performance is beyond expectations. Boots up in 3/4 seconds and works without lag. This is expected from pc of this cost but this is beyond expectations. ####   Awesome. Premium in every way. ####   Good buy ####   Absolutely love this 2-in-1 laptop ##  though it cost me above ₹75k ####   A perfect device ####   There is an issue with the Speaker volume - it's inconsistent - probably because of a driver and Windows 10 update conflict. No solution found till now. ####   Great product. Sleek design. Long battery. Amazing styllus ## very light weight. Serves all purposes. Must have for teachers and professionals engaged in presentation ####   I have bought an HP envy x 360 laptop . The serial # of my laptop is CNDO3946SG . I faced an issue with the laptop . The internal speakers stopped working all of a sudden. I called customer support  ##  they troubleshoot it and they said that the technician will be sent to my place  ##  who will fix the problem. After a week I was informed that technician will visit to your place . The technician came and suggested that it is not a hardware issue  ## it is an operating system issue . I was told another technician will visit my place on priority basis as I have waited for a long time. I was assured a technician will visit to my place within 48 hours and he will fix this problem. After waiting for more than a stipulated time ##  I called the customer service to inform them that the. Technician hasn’t visited my place yet and I was waiting for a long time  ##  please resolve this issue as soon as possible. I was informed  that the case has been closed and I was shocked how can they close the case without any communication from them . I called again and I was informed that they can’t help me . I wonder what kind of on-site warranty your company provides to customers . When we need the on-site service we are being delayed and denied . I request you kind take your laptop back and refund me my money so that I will buy a laptop from some good service provider . I am having a worst experience with HP . I will never recommend any of my friends or colleagues to buy anything from HP. I will give my reviews on every social media platforms and I will make sure no other customer suffers as I have. ####   Components and premium  ##  laptop and lightweight and compact. ####   Screen resolution and clarity : superb ####   Great product. Positives: sturdy ##  sleek ##  elegant ##  backlit keyboard ##  touchscreen (with/without stylus) ##  360 degree rotation ##  great battery life ##  strategic positions of speakers.
